org.spongepowered.api.text

Interface TextFactory


  • public interface TextFactory
    Represents the required implementation for the static methods in Texts.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char getLegacyChar()
      Returns the default legacy formatting character.
      Text parseJson(String json)
      Parses the specified JSON text and returns the parsed result.
      Text parseJsonLenient(String json)
      Parses the specified JSON text leniently and returns the parsed result.
      Text.Literal parseLegacyMessage(String text, char code)
      Creates a Message from a legacy string, given a color character.
      String replaceLegacyCodes(String text, char from, char to)
      Replaces the given formatting character with another given formatting character from a legacy string.
      String stripLegacyCodes(String text, char code)
      Removes the legacy formatting character from a legacy string.
      String toJson(Text text)
      Returns a JSON representation of the Text as used in commands.
      String toJson(Text text, Locale locale)
      Returns a JSON representation of the Text as used in commands in the specified language.
      String toLegacy(Text text, char code)
      Returns a representation of the Text using the legacy color codes.
      String toLegacy(Text text, char code, Locale locale)
      Returns a representation of the Text using the legacy color codes in the given Locale.
      String toPlain(Text text)
      Returns a plain text representation of the Text without any formattings.
      String toPlain(Text text, Locale locale)
      Returns a plain text representation of the Text without any formatting in the provided Locale.

        throws IllegalArgumentException

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The parsed text
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the JSON is invalid

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        The parsed text
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If the JSON couldn't be parsed
